settings.name: Shrenik Pillai
settings.title: Data Scientist
settings.summary: Specializing in ML pipelines, data science, and Cloud infrastructure with a focus on optimization and pattern recognition.

items.description:
Built scalable ML data pipelines on AWS (Docker, Kubernetes) serving 70+ stakeholders at Mondelez, processing 1M+ daily records with feature engineering for downstream ML model training and personalization analytics. 

Implemented ELK Stack monitoring for ML systems enabling real-time model performance tracking and data drift detection, improving operational efficiency by 15% and reducing model training time by 30%.

Developed real-time object detection system using TensorFlow, YOLO, and OpenCV achieving 90%+ accuracy, building end-to-end ML pipeline from data annotation through production deployment via Azure DevOps and Docker. 



Experimented with multiple neural network architectures and hyperparameter tuning reducing inference latency by 35% through systematic A/B testing, demonstrating strong problem-solving and cross-functional collaboration skills.

items.title: Lie Detection System
items.description: Designed supervised learning system using TensorFlow and MediaPipe achieving 85% accuracy by experimentation with Random Forest, SVM, and neural networks on 10,000+ facial image dataset with AWS deployment. Optimized production ML pipeline with <100ms inference latency applying A/B testing framework and explainability techniques, demonstrating understanding of experimentation design and end-to-end ML system development.

items.institution: The University of Texas at Dallas
items.degree: Master of Business Analytics and Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Bachelor of Computer Science and Electronics Engineering
